relnotes.name: vCard and vCal
relnotes.purpose: vCard and vCalendar parsing and generation

defect.title: vCal RRule imported incorrectly when no duration specified

relnotes.defect: vCal fix to ensure that when no duration is specified and no end date is given in the RRULE property, to set the duration value as 2 and thus comply with the expected default behaviour as per the RFC 2445 standard.
